```{r}
library(plm)
library(tidyverse)
df <- read.csv("../Data/casesPopDistancingMasking.csv")
head(df)
```


```{r}
plm(log(TotalCases) ~ log(DEATHS2019) + log(county_population) + log(Shape__Area) + log(grade_total) + NEVER + RARELY + SOMETIMES, 
    data = df[rowSums(is.na(df)) == 0,1])
```
